body.p: convicted of Felony two years at the oct term 1858 time Expires oct the 5th 1860 Sente convicted in Jefferson Co
I hope you will Restore the above named convict now confined in the Pen he has been a good and faithful prisoner
P. S he wishes to get a pardon this Evening so he can get on the dawn train in the Morning
